item.title: Bitcoin Price Analysis: What the $118K Level Means for 2025
item.description: Bitcoin’s journey through 2025 has been nothing short of remarkable. As we examine the current price action around the critical $118K level, several key factors are shaping the cryptocurrency’s trajectory.
